All 21 Orangevale Restaurants» Adalberto's Mexican Food 8844 Greenback Ln , Orangevale , CA 95662-4019 916-988-6508 Got a photo? Add it. Ranked #8 of 21 restaurants in Orangevale 5 Reviews Cuisines: Mexican Restaurant details Update restaurant details Write a Review 5 reviews from our community 60% Recommend Excellent 2 Very good 1 Average 1 Poor 0 Terrible 1 Rating summary Food Service Value Atmosphere 5 reviews sorted by Date Rating English first Any gfales Orangev 1 review “disgusting!” Reviewed August 2, 2011 I have been here three times and have always ordered a carnitas burrito. Just went through the drivethru and placed my order. All was good until I took my first bite and had a mouthful of cartilage. I took my chances and kept eating, and about every third bite had the same. The whole burrito was full of cartilage. I... More
Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? TifLaf Eureka, CA Contributor 13 reviews Reviews in 2 cities 7 helpful votes “Almost always makes me sick yet I keep going back for more!!!” Reviewed March 12, 2010 My dear friend Adalberto's: why does something so good have to be so bad? It almost always seems to make my tummy hurt, but they are always open, the food is cheap and tasty, the portion size is, well huge. There is nothing like an Adalberto's egg, bacon and potato burrito at 3 A.M.!! Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? RPF49 Davis, California Top Contributor 193 reviews Reviews in 32 cities 174 helpful votes “Great Mexican fast food” Reviewed July 2, 2009 Adalberto's is the best Mexican fast food around in an old-style drive-in (i.e, not counting some of the newer taquerias, although it's better than a lot of those too). Great taste, huge portions, definitely not for the diet conscious!! Budget prices. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? Ramblingrochelle California Reviewer 3 reviews Reviews in 2 cities 2 helpful votes “Amazingly authentic quality mexican food at fast food prices” Reviewed July 30, 2008 1 person found this review helpful There is no better place to eat this side of Mexico for quality authentic mexican food. Set up like a fast food restaurant with fast food ordering, an optional drive up window for on the go travelers and small tables to eat inside , it isnt meant to keep you lingering. They also have a small mexican store on site.... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? A TripAdvisor reviewer on Facebook 1 helpful vote “Yummy #24.” Reviewed February 7, 2008 Yummy #24. Was this review helpful?
